title: vAzhalAm manamE
sahitya:
vAzhalAm manamE iLam vanappuDanE nUru vayadu


anupallavi

  tAzhvilAdu nOyilAdu tanga uDalil mangaLamAi nI


caraNam 1    kATrum kadirum pOTri uzhaittuk-kAi kani dhAnyam pusittu
kUTrinukkum anjA shakti kuNDalik-kanalirk-kuLittu kaLittu
    caraNam 2    brahmacariyak-kalvi kaTrup-piriyamAna manaiyai Etru 
aram poruL inba vIDaLittiDum ANDavan tiruvaruLaik-kUTTi
